Amrish Puri was a man who astonished us with his remarkable acting and dialogue delivery, including the famous, Mogambo khush hua. He was the scariest yet the most endearing villains of his time. Unfortunately, he passed away at the age of 72 on 12th January 2005 in Mumbai due to cerebral hemorrhage.
So, today we pay a tribute to the legend by bringing you some of his epic dialogues that will remain etched in our hearts for a very long time.
